name: BackhandedMotivation
0:
”Alexa, open backhanded motivation.”
”Alexa, open backhanded motivation and inspire me.”
”Alexa, ask backhanded motivation to motivate me.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: backhanded motivation
des: With Backhanded Motivation, you might find way to accomplish amazing tasks, or maybe become inspired to be your best self and might conquer the world. Maybe. But you will certainly be encouraged to laugh at yourself and others as you strive for greater productivity in your day and a greater perspective on life. So sit back, lighten up, and enjoy your increased perception of productivity.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
